mapper.select: SELECT user_challenge_id, fund_id, user_id, current_count, fail_count, challenge_status AS challengeStatus FROM user_challenge WHERE user_challenge_id = #{userChallengeId}

SELECT uc.user_challenge_id AS userChallengeId, uc.current_count AS currentCount, uc.fail_count AS failCount, p.name AS challengeName, i.image_url AS challengeImageUrl, c.challenge_start_date AS challengeStartDate, c.challenge_end_date AS challengeEndDate, c.reward AS reward, c.verify_standard AS verifyStandard FROM user_challenge uc JOIN fund f ON uc.fund_id = f.fund_id JOIN challenge c ON f.product_id = c.product_id JOIN financial_product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN s3_image i ON p.product_id = i.post_id AND i.image_type = 'Funding' WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.challenge_start_date DESC

SELECT uc.user_challenge_id AS userChallengeId, uc.current_count AS currentCount, uc.fail_count AS failCount, p.name AS challengeName, i.image_url AS challengeImageUrl, c.challenge_start_date AS challengeStartDate, c.challenge_end_date AS challengeEndDate, c.reward AS reward, c.verify_standard AS verifyStandard FROM user_challenge uc JOIN fund f ON uc.fund_id = f.fund_id JOIN challenge c ON f.product_id = c.product_id JOIN financial_product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN s3_image i ON p.product_id = i.post_id AND i.image_type = 'Funding' WHERE uc.user_challenge_id = #{userChallengeId}

SELECT uc.user_challenge_id AS userChallengeId, uc.user_id AS userId, m.username AS username, m.nickname AS nickname, uc.current_count AS currentCount, uc.fail_count AS failCount FROM user_challenge uc JOIN member m ON uc.user_id = m.user_id WHERE uc.fund_id = #{fundId}
